content:
Thunderbird will behave like any good mail client will

  • if you are using imap, https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/imap-synchronization
  • if you are using pop, downloaded messages are removed from the server, unless you use one of the pop settings described at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/configuration-options-accounts
creator: wsmwk

content: The easiest way is to use the importexport addon. Or you could use tools>import>importfromathunderbirdinstallation and then tick import a profile.
creator: davidsk
